subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Baseball
Shea Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: As damp as the weather was, it was hard to extricate the hope of spring from the rush of a new baseball season from the curiosity about a new ballpark.
